column4: Microsoft  InMobi collaborate to offer marketing capabilities to enterprise customers
column5: Microsoft Corp on Tuesday said it will partner with  India-based mobile ad tech company InMobi  seeking to provide Azure cloud customers artificial intelligence-backed marketing insights.

column4: Microsoft  InMobi collaborate to offer marketing capabilities to enterprise customers
column5: June 26 Microsoft Corp on Tuesday said it will partner with  India-based mobile ad tech company InMobi  seeking to provide Azure cloud customers artificial intelligence-backed marketing insights.

column4: Battery in fatal Florida Tesla crash reignited twice: NTSB report
column5: WASHINGTON A Tesla Inc Model S involved in a May 8 fatal high-speed crash in Florida reignited twice after firefighters extinguished a fire in the electric vehicle  the National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB) said in a preliminary report on Tuesday. | Video

column4: Battery in fatal Tesla crash in Florida reignited twice -NTSB report
column5: WASHINGTON  June 26 A Tesla Inc Model S involved in a May 8 fatal high-speed crash in Florida reignited twice after firefighters extinguished a fire in the electric vehicle  the National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB) said in a preliminary report on Tuesday.

column4: Audi partners with Israel's autonomous vehicle simulation startup Cognata
column5: June 26 German carmaker Audi AG has partnered with autonomous vehicle simulation platform provider Cognata Ltd to speed up the development of autonomous vehicles  the Israel-based startup said on Tuesday.
